title: Wangscape tile groups schema
description: Lists Wangscape output tiles with locations, grouped by corner terrain types.

^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a.title: Tile group schema
^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a.description: Lists the locations of all output tiles with a given sequence of corner terrain types.

items.title: Tile location schema
items.description: Specifies the location of a Wangscape output tile.

filename.title: Specifies the filename of the tileset containing the tile.

x.title: Tile x offset schema
x.description: Specifies the horizontal offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.

y.title: Tile y offset schema
y.description: Specifies the vertical offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.
